00125     inline MapValue getMapValue(int x, int y) const;

00151 inline MapTile ToolEffects::getMapTile(const Position& pos) const
00152 {
00153     return this->getMapValue(pos) & LOMASK;
00154 }
00155 
00164 inline MapValue ToolEffects::getMapTile(int x, int y) const
00165 {
00166     return this->getMapValue(Position(x, y)) & LOMASK;
00167 }
00172 inline int ToolEffects::getCost() const
00173 {
00174     return this->cost;
00175 }
00176 
00180 inline void ToolEffects::addCost(int amount)
00181 {
00182     assert(amount >= 0); // To be on the safe side.
00183     this->cost += amount;
00184 }
00185 
00194 inline MapValue ToolEffects::getMapValue(int x, int y) const
00195 {
00196     return this->getMapValue(Position(x, y));
00197 }
00198 
00206 inline void ToolEffects::setMapValue(int x, int y, MapValue mapVal)
00207 {
00208     this->setMapValue(Position(x, y), mapVal);
00209 }
00210 
00215 inline void ToolEffects::addFrontendMessage(FrontendMessage *msg)
00216 {
00217     this->frontendMessages.push_back(msg);
00218 }
